revised_title: The Eclipse Foretold by Thales: A Chronological Analysis
tldr: The author examines various historical accounts and calculations to determine the correct year of the eclipse foretold by Thales. After analyzing the works of Hipparchus, Theon, Cleomedes, and others, the author concludes that the eclipse occurred in the year before Christ 603 and was not the cause of the battle between the Lydians and the Medes as described by Herodotus.
